Articles.Content:
Watch endless destruction as I try to launch a 200+ ton monstrosity in preparation for a massive Lathe colony mission.

http://www.twitch.tv/captsierra

Also, tune in early and get a sneak preview of what I am working on mod-wise!

Edited September 14, 2013 by Captain Sierra
Breaking schedule and going up in a few moments. Today, I launch a prebuilt probe voyage to Eeloo.

Well, I was unable to go up on shcedule today so here is the consolation prize. Unfortunately, I also was unable to finish the Hab attachments to the Horizon station. Tune in to see the ensuing destruction live!
